summary: Diff focuses on frontend routing/UX changes (ensuring '/' shows login and guarding steps) and a change to the HTML <title>. There is no clear evidence of any production deployment configuration change that would fix the invalid domain slug, so REQ-8’s core deployment/config objective appears unimplemented in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the production deployment configuration to use a valid domain slug (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens; no colons or other symbols) instead of the invalid slug 'public-applicant-onboarding-flow:-internet-identit', and deploy the app as a live/public build.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment/hosting configuration files are shown as modified (e.g., dfx.json, canister config, deployment pipeline config). The only slug-related change visible is an HTML title update, which does not demonstrate a valid domain slug being configured for production deployment.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed routing behavior to remove/avoid a dedicated '/login' route and enforce that unauthenticated users see LoginRegisterPage at '/', with protected route wrappers and step-guard redirects.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 is specifically about fixing a production domain slug for live deployment. While the AC mentions '/' should load the login page, the diff implements broader routing/guard logic that is not explicitly requested as part of fixing the domain slug configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed HTML document title to "Public Applicant Onboarding Flow" described as "slug-safe".
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 requires configuring a valid *domain slug* in production deployment config; changing the page title is not the same as setting a deployment domain slug and was not requested explicitly.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state describing features and requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-8 and not needed to fix deployment domain slug validation.
